name: 通瑟·萨勒曼
introduction: He graduated from Hacettepe University State Conservatory Theater Acting Department in 1990. He worked at the Ankara State Theater for a year. 1993-2001 at the Antalya State Theater Directorate at work.It has been broadcast in Bursa State Theater since 2002. In addition to your theater actors, he also works for the next movies and television.In 1997, she founded the "OL Theater" with the Azerbaijani hometown Namik Agayev. The play "Welcome Nazim" was staged as the first project of the theatre.Then, the theater play Seagull, adapted from Richard's play of the same name, was performed.
